vectortransform.Vector

  • Packages that use Vector 
    Package Description
    vectortransform  

    • Uses of Vector in vectortransform

      Methods in vectortransform that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector DecimalMatrix.extractVector(int j)
      Creates a Vector by extracting a column vector at a given column index in this Matrix.
      Vector[] VectorPolygon.getAdjustedVectors() 
      Vector[] TransformationWorkSpace.getPoints() 
      Vector Vector.reflect2DOrigin()
      Reflects this Vector around both axes, by changing the sign of both of its coordinates.
      Vector Vector.reflect2DX()
      Reflects this Vector around the x axis, by changing the sign of its y coordinate.
      Vector Vector.reflect2DY()
      Reflects this Vector around the y axis, by changing the sign of its x coordinate.
      Vector Vector.rotate2D(java.lang.Double angle, boolean isClockWise)
      Rotates this Vector around the origin point, by the given angle and in the given direction.
      Vector Vector.scaleProportional(double scalar)
      Scales the y and x values of this Vector up by the received scalar.
      Vector Vector.scaleX(double scalar)
      Scales the x value of this Vector up by the received scalar.
      Vector Vector.scaleY(double scalar)
      Scales the y value of this Vector up by the received scalar.
      Vector Vector.shear2DX(double scalar)
      Performs a shear mapping of a point along the x axis, based on its signed distance from the x axis (equivalent to its y coordinate).
      Vector Vector.shear2DY(double scalar)
      Performs a shear mapping of a point along the y axis, based on its signed distance from the y axis (equivalent to its x coordinate).
      Methods in vectortransform with parameters of type Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DecimalMatrix DecimalMatrix.buildFromVectors(Vector... vectors)
      Builds a Matrix from Vectors by concatenating them one by one.
      DecimalMatrix DecimalMatrix.concatenateVector(Vector vector)
      Concatenates this Matrix with a Vector by creating a new Matrix combining the data of this Matrix and the Vector.
      void CoordinateGrid.drawPositionVectors(Vector[] vectors)
      Draws points on the grid based on Vectors in an array.
      void CoordinateGrid.drawVectorPolygon(Vector[] vectors)
      Draws a polygon on the grid based on a VectorPolygon built from a Vector array.
      double Vector.get2DAngle(Vector v2)
      Gets the (signed) angle between two two-dimensional vectors, seen from a position orthogonal to the x-and-y-axes on a Cartesian plane.
      double Vector.getAngle(Vector v2)
      Gets the general angle between two vectors of arbitrary (but equal) dimensions.
